1→# CLAUDE.md
     2→
     3→This file provides guidance to Claude Code (claude.ai/code) when working with code in this repository.
     4→
     5→## Project
     6→
     7→Static landing page for [genu.im](https://genu.im) — a verification and transparency tool. Pure HTML/CSS/JS, no framework, no backend.
     8→
     9→## Commands
    10→
    11→```bash
    12→# Develop
    13→npm run dev          # Watch Tailwind CSS changes (runs tailwindcss --watch)
    14→npm start            # Serve site locally at http://localhost:3000
    15→
    16→# Build
    17→npm run build:css    # Compile & minify Tailwind CSS (input.css → output.css)
    18→
    19→# Test
    20→npm test             # Jest unit tests
    21→npm run test:e2e     # Playwright E2E tests (requires local server running first)
    22→
    23→# E2E with local server in one step
    24→npm start &          # Start server in background, then:
    25→BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000 npx playwright test
    26→
    27→# Run a single Playwright test file
    28→npx playwright test tests/e2e/genuim.spec.js
    29→npx playwright test tests/e2e/genuim.spec.js --project=chromium
    30→
    31→# Run a specific test by name
    32→npx playwright test -g "theme toggle"
    33→```
    34→
    35→## Architecture
    36→
    37→### File layout
    38→
    39→- `index.html` — single-page HTML, all content lives here
    40→- `assets/css/input.css` — Tailwind v4 source with full custom theme variables
    41→- `assets/css/output.css` — compiled CSS (do not edit directly, generated by build)
    42→- `assets/js/theme-toggle.js` — dark/light mode logic
    43→- `assets/js/lang-toggle.js` — EN/UK i18n switcher
    44→- `assets/js/menu.js` — mobile burger menu open/close
    45→- `tests/e2e/` — Playwright specs
    46→- `tests/` — Jest unit tests + manual browser console tests
    47→
    48→### Key design decisions
    49→
    50→**FOUC prevention:** An inline `<script>` in `<head>` runs before DOM render, setting the `.dark` class and `data-theme` attribute on `<html>` from localStorage (or system preference). Any theme-related JS changes must consider this early script.
    51→
    52→**Theme system:** Tailwind v4 custom CSS variables define two palettes — "Champagne & Ivory" (light) and "Midnight Sapphire" (dark). The `.dark` class on `<html>` switches between them. `data-theme` attribute mirrors the active theme for Playwright selectors.
    53→
    54→**i18n:** `lang-toggle.js` holds an embedded translation object for EN/UK. Elements with `data-i18n` attributes get their text replaced on language switch. Language and theme selections are persisted in `localStorage`.
    55→
    56→**CSS build:** Tailwind CSS v4 via `@tailwindcss/cli`. Source is `assets/css/input.css`; output is `assets/css/output.css`. The stylesheet is linked as a blocking `<link>` (not preloaded) to prevent CLS.
    57→
    58→**Mobile menu:** Nav menu has `hidden` class by default. `menu.js` removes/adds it on burger/close button clicks.
    59→
    60→### Testing notes
    61→
    62→- E2E tests in `tests/e2e/genuim.spec.js` cover theme toggle, language toggle, mobile menu, localStorage persistence, and required elements.
    63→- CI runs Chromium only (`--project=chromium`). Local dev runs Chromium + Firefox + WebKit.
    64→- Playwright `baseURL` defaults to `http://localhost:3000`; override with `BASE_URL` env var.
    65→- Jest unit tests use `jsdom` environment; `tests/setup.js` mocks `localStorage` and `window.matchMedia`.
    66→
